text: Kahl is a 1961 West German short documentary film about the Kahl Nuclear Power Plant. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1961 films Category:1961 documentary films Category:1961 short films Category:West German films Category:German-language films Category:German documentary films Category:German short films Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about nuclear technology Category:Films set in Bavaria
title: Kahl (film)
